DataElement.preferredName: Study Protocol Document Data Monitoring Committee Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:A group delegated to consider some matter; a self-constituted organization to promote something.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Values of two-valued logic.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Protocol Document Data Monitoring Committee Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:A group delegated to consider some matter; a self-constituted organization to promote something.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:An organized collection of records that describe a particular body of data.

Concepts.definition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
A physical object, or electronic counterpart, that is characterized by containing writing which is meant to be human-readable.

Property.preferredDefinition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).:A group delegated to consider some matter; a self-constituted organization to promote something.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.
The act of observing something (and sometimes keeping a record of it).
A group delegated to consider matters concerning clinical studies or trials.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 7/22/2021wz: released for UML model cleanup project.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 2/19/13 Added AIM Foundation Model CSI reference. jc
